name: places/ChIJ9cW0bGpZwokR-4Z5iSGZ0hg
formattedAddress: 20 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 20 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: The pieces are decent - don't get me wrong. Most of the designs are chic. Just beware of this one lady at the Hudson Yards store who is outright rude. She showed little to no respect for me while I was shopping there. Also keep in mind that all of their in-store items are for final sale, meaning you can't get return them. I have a friend who bought items there and wanted to get a return, but was turned away, which is ridiculous because none of the store employees had even mentioned to her that she cannot get a return / the items are for final sale. She was also faced with such animosity when she went back to the store to ask for a return with the lady at the store fully belittling her for wanting to get a return. Ridiculous customer service. Could grow as a better brand if they fixed this problem and got rid of rude employees.

originalText.text:
I have shopped here a few times before and recently visited this store with the intention of making a significant purchase from this brand (considering how much the clothes are).  While I was trying on clothes, I overheard the staff making offhand comments about me without realizing I heard them. This behavior was not only unprofessional but also incredibly immature. As a customer, I expect to be treated with respect and courtesy, regardless of the amount I spend.

Moreover, I was taken aback by the aggressive approach of pulling out numerous items that I did not even ask for. It made me feel overwhelmed and pressured. If the staff had taken the time to understand my preferences and needs, I would have been more inclined to make additional purchases. Finally, all the items sold at this store are final sale - no refunds so beware.

I cancelled my order as I no longer wish to support a business that condones such unprofessional behavior.

I hope that the management of this store takes this review seriously and takes appropriate action to address these issues. It is crucial to create a welcoming and respectful environment for customers. Until then, I cannot recommend this store to others who value SA who truly care about their customers.

originalText.text: Visited the Hudson Yards store while in New York from Toronto this past weekend. A beautiful store with amazing clothes (the colours!) and truly lovely service. I changed my mind on my first purchases and when I returned the next day to exchange them, we were met with the same helpful and kind service and advice as the day before. I wore my gorgeous deep pink cashmere sweater and shell to dinner that evening :)

originalText.text:
I had my own fashion  business in New Zealand for 30 years with my former husband so speak with some credibility.
Scanlan and Theodore is a shining star as an Australian fashion label and Internationally as well.
The presentation,quality,wearability and glamour are key elements for me in a successful product.
Rarely do I want to cull the pieces I have,but rather add  delicious new pieces to my expanding wardrobe.
The Collections are always designed with really good basics ,which you can then wrap your glamour pieces around.
The foundation of a great Collection.
Well done team

originalText.text:
Dear Madi (the Hudson yards store), thank you so much for your highly professional styling advice,
and thank you for making my overall experience with the brand so warm and productive.

Will definitely purchase more!
